gold.user: As a project manager, I want to retrieve all available project types in Jira so that I can choose the appropriate one for my new project.
gold.ideal: The response should include a list of all project types with their keys and names, allowing me to understand the options available.

gold.user: As a team member, I need to see all project types that I have access to, so I can select one for my tasks.
gold.ideal: The response should return only the project types that I have permission to access, along with their details.

gold.user: As a developer, I want to get detailed information about a specific project type using its key to understand its configuration.
gold.ideal: The response should provide comprehensive details about the project type, including its name, description, and any associated settings.

gold.user: As a project administrator, I need to check if a specific project type is accessible for my team members based on their permissions.
